info.name: Greasy Fork - Despicable Error
info.description:
Display Minion on error pages. Compatibility:
  • Firefox or compatible
  • Chrome or compatible
Example pages:
  • https://greasyfork.org/404
  • https://greasyfork.org/422
  • https://greasyfork.org/500
